institution.title: Institution
institution.description: Name of the financial institution providing the account.

aggregationServiceId.title: Aggregation Service ID
aggregationServiceId.description: Identifier for this account in a financial data aggregation service (e.g., Plaid).

statementClosingDay.title: Statement Closing Day
statementClosingDay.description: The day of the month the statement is issued (for credit cards).

paymentDueDate.title: Payment Due Date
paymentDueDate.description: Next payment due date in YYYY-MM-DD format, if applicable.

creditLimit.title: Credit Limit
creditLimit.description: Credit limit for the account, if applicable.

apr.title: APR
apr.description: Annual percentage rate for the account, if applicable.

closedAt.title: Closed At
closedAt.description: Timestamp when the account was closed, if applicable (UTC).
